data.title: WEDDINGS; Dawn Zappetti, Patrick Sullivan
data.text:
Dawn Michele Zappetti, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas A. Zappetti of Holbrook, N.Y., was married last evening to Patrick Joseph Sullivan, the son of Barbara J. Sullivan of Chappaqua, N.Y., and the late Mr. Sullivan Sr. The Rev. James J. Gardiner performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Francis Xavier in New York.

The couple, both 31, graduated from Cornell University.

The bride, who received an M.B.A. from Columbia University, is an assistant vice president, in Long Island City, Queens, of the credit-card marketing department of Citibank. Her father is the president of Unitron, a manufacturer of optical instruments in Bohemia, N.Y. Her mother, Mary Ann Zappetti, is the principal of the Blue Point (N.Y.) Elementary School.

The bridegroom, who received a master's degree in operations research from Stanford University, is a marketing manager at the American International Group, the insurance and financial service company in New York. His mother is the president of the Royal Realty Company, a management company in Yonkers. His father was a drug crisis counselor in Houston.
